name: gloobies go CRAZY!!! (Alpha 1.2)
description:
meet the gloobies! the secondary goal of this game is to stand up and make as many points as you can. the first one is to go CRAZY!!!

controls:

gooba (red) - spacebar

galub (blue) - left mouse button

gulby (purple) - "A" key

glob (green) - enter

mub (yellow) - "0 (zero)" key

William (pink) - "H" key
